modName: Skryim COPS Main Menu Theme Song HD
summary: Adds Skyrim: COPS theme music to your main menu
descriptionHtml:
Simply adds the Skyrim: COPS main theme music to your own main menu.

Video:
[youtube]wyTGefmN_Ys[/youtube]
Installation:
Just install using NMM to be sure everything gets put in place.

Changelog: v1.0.0 - Original mod uploaded
v1.0.0.1 - Changed description to clarify what mod is
v1.0.1 - Increased volume slightly and obtained official permissions
                                       v1.0.2 - Made audio quality much clearer

Compatibility:
Will not be compatible with any mod that changes the main menu music obviously

Permissions:
Since I had to obtain permissions from the composer of the piece of music, you would have to do so also before using the music from this mod. If you would like to use the music from the mod, first obtain those permissions and then message me on Nexus or at my email (mcolv73@gmail.com)

Credits:
COPS Skyrim Theme by Evan Goldman - www.evangoldmanmusic.com - creator of the theme
author: Froz3nlegend
